abilities.name: The Best Defense...
abilities.description: Doomfist generates temporary personal shields when he deals ability damage.

abilities.name: Hand Cannon
abilities.description: Doomfist fires a short-range burst from the knuckles of his fist. Its ammunition is automatically regenerated over a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Punch
abilities.description: After charging up, Doomfist lunges forward and knocks an enemy back, dealing additional damage if they impact a wall.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps forward and smashes into the ground.

abilities.name: Power Block
abilities.description: Protect yourself from frontal attacks. Taking 25 damage empowers the next Rocket Punch and immediately resets its cooldown (100 mitigated = 125 incoming = 25 hp lost).

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps into the sky, then crashes to the ground, dealing significant damage. Doomfist is invincible during his ultimate, and speeds up cooldown rate of his abilities by 100% while in the air. Empowers Rocket Punch on landing.
